%dw 2.0
type accounts = Array<{| id: String, firstName: String, lastName: String, address: String, postal: String, country: String, creationDate: String, accountType: String, miles: Number {"typeId": "int"}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":\\\"100\\\",\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"Alice\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Green\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"77 Geary St., San Francisco\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"94108\\\",\\\"country\\\":\\\"USA\\\",\\\"creationDate\\\":\\\"2018-10-01T23:57:59Z+0:00\\\",\\\"accountType\\\":\\\"business\\\",\\\"miles\\\":1000}]"}
